title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: MEROKEETY Women's Winter Fall Long Sleeve Tunic Sweaters 2026 Casual Trendy Crew Neck Waffle Knit Pullover Tops Jumper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leggings top
items.body: I’m 5 ft 3 and weigh 130 and 68 years old. I’m evenly proportioned. I seem to always be in between a small and medium tops. I bought this sweater size medium to wear with leggings. Wanted it to look a little oversized. This sweater just covered my behind in length. Length of sleeves just fit. Not too baggy. If I wanted a more relaxed look I would need a large. The comments from others on the feel isn’t so much what fabric is made of but the waffle pattern itself. I actually like the feeling. The weight is neither too thin or thick. Just right. Cost matches the quality. Read more
items.author: Half Pint

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my favorite sweaters
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I love this sweater. I really like the color of it. It’s not an itchy material. I wouldn’t say it’s soft, but it’s not itchy. It’s loose and comfortable in overall very cute. I’m 5’2 and 150 pounds. I ordered a medium. Read more
items.author: Justin Forristal

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the color and length.
items.body: I just love this color, and the length is perfect for us plus size ladies who like to cover their rear. It is a lighter weight sweater, so it’s more suited for cool weather vs cold. It is true to size, comfortable and is a good quality. I’ve washed it several times and it still looks great. Read more
items.author: aMUSTardSEEd1720

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fall/winter sweater
items.body: Great sweater! I love this over sized sweater in an army green color. When it arrived the color and feel of the fabric was not what I was expecting. After washing it, it softened up and felt great and the color was as pictured. It is very warm and flattering in the fall winter months and it fits me perfect being 5’1 and 150lbs. Read more
items.author: Tanya H. Stewart

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and we'll made!
items.body: These sweaters are great quality! I bought one a few years ago that I loved and decided to order another from the brand and it met my expectations. Read more
items.author: Devin

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pilling
items.body: I love the style, color (pink), and comfort of the sweater. The sweater pilled really bad which is unusual for this brand. I would love a grey but do not want to deal with pilling. Read more
items.author: Delaware Cat Mom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size up for oversized look!
items.body: Love these sweaters! I ordered 3 different colors! I'm usually a medium (5'7", 150lbs.) but sized up for an oversized look with leggings, and it covers my butt! Read more
items.author: Kelsey McBroom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful purple sweater
items.body: Beautifully rich deep purple color, soft fabric, quality knit. Read more
items.author: Jae

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Cream, Apricot, Dusty Pink, Army Green, Black, Brick Red, Royal, Beige, Royal Blue, Mauve, Teal, Grey, Light Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
